snippet.title: Prince of Persia® The Shadow and the Flame -- Dev Diary 2
snippet.description:
Follow the team behind Prince of Persia® The Shadow and the Flame on this dev diary 2 !
Prince of Persia® The Shadow and The Flame is a pick up and play, smooth adaptation of an epic classic easy to handle but challenging to master. Play as the Prince who must battle the odds again to save his Princess and kingdom on a journey that will pave the path to his origins.

Download on iOS
http://ad.apps.fm/Ze04pVekJhWZAB5lZCBhIJlGdQx2HnuCQzZYFn2j1GjwSJsxHALdD59478CqJoNyIGyIGNfYLfZOYQ9amZlEtEV48qnkBTJK-1cU8XK4UuTQQFtvGmGm78YegHkNWCxf

GooglePlay 
http://ad.apps.fm/7XXn7ygpiDvQImpgezCz615KLoEjTszcQMJsV6-2VnHFDLXitVHB6BlL95nuoNYfghvdKDivrdLcHzMdBHAAr0bAWWbcIlx2D-O9R_nTMmMwPrj0tnULRWwnygPIPMeNFiwKzSQR_tuYVTB7z65DVIS8a_C9FkhDzrGkIU889lY

Amazon http://ad.apps.fm/giNMzpethchlCAAmQ5cWytbz3nTLWdXBIvbs2iCJt3vbeV3C_4MOnwMdkxiDYV2dt0XsLGk4NP4UdKEY1eiCYedacQtYMA3Nysw5HpRNpuNZsiSa-6jM2yTKmjxmFCrEE-xsNstlYeEKq8WoLsvaufNcb6Ge8wDv50TSYgZcrcY

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/UbisoftMobile
